name: Shaperwave
description:
Shaperwave is a one button minimalistic geometric ricochet pinball golf arcade game created by Team NikuNami for the 2018 Winter ICT Game Jam.  All art and music assets are original. Developed in Unity.

Gameplay:

Try to get as many points as you can and capture the ball in one of the targets before the 30 second timer runs out!

Xbox Controls:

  • Left Joystick - Rotate ball
  • Back - Exit to Title
  • A - For everything else

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Rotate ball
  • ESC - Exit to Title
  • Space - For everything else

Team Members / Roles:

  • Art
    • Alexandra Nguyen
  • Development
    • Michael Karpinski
    • Curtis Mullins
  • Music/Sound
    • Brandon Dickerson

Link to original soundtrack:

https://soundcloud.com/brandondickerson/sets/shaperwave-ost
